The Ruby Ring (TV 1997)
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0134942/
Young Lucy McLaughlin's father has lost his job and to help make ends meet she is sent to live with her Grandmother. To help her get over her loss, the old lady gives Lucy a magic ring which will grant her two wishes...
